main event: A UFO sighting reported in Yakima, Washington, on 21 August 1968, described a bright gold object observed in the sky.
interesting points: The sighting lasted approximately 45 minutes,The observers included a housewife and two boys aged 9 and 11,The object was described as larger than an average star and silent,It appeared to move in a straight line with some brief maneuvering, and it faded away slowly at the end of the observation.
sighted object: bright gold object in the sky
witness description: a housewife and two boys aged 9 and 11
